resources.string: Here you can have the AI generate questions by selecting several items. This template prompt is recommended when the specifics are not very clear or when you want to generate questions easily.

Here, you can enter specific details and have the AI generate questions for you. This manual prompt is recommended when the specific content is clearly defined or when you want to generate questions with detailed content.
Are you sure you want to delete this question?
At least one item must be selected.
Blank space does not generate a question.
